page.title: 13SULPHUR SPRING WATER
page.content:
{ ( See page}7{) { {Chemical Analysis:}One imperial gallon of Spa water contains :_Protocarbonate of Iron 0.66; Carbonate Lime, 2.39; Carbonate of Magnesia , 0.73; Sulphate of Lime , 0.41; Sulphate of Potash, 0.11; Sulphate of Soda, 2.62; Chloride of Sodium, 1.78; Organic Matter, 1.92; Silica, 0.81; Total,37.99; Specific Gravity, 1.003;Combined Carbonic Acid Gas, 22.56 cubic inches; Free Carbonic Acid, 0.44 do.total in one gallon, 23.00; Oxygen Gas in one gallon, 2.2 cubic inches; Nitrogen Gas, 5.8 do.; Sulphurated Hydrogen, 2.10 do.
SIGNATURE:GILSLAND WI**********
